flavour: The beast rushed at them, wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…
info: Keep a non-Gold unit on the battlefield at the end of this round.
name: Adrenaline Rush

flavour: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.
info: Play immediately from your deck whenever there are 5 or more revealed Elf units on your side.
name: Aelirenn

flavour: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.
info: Spawn a Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain card.
name: Aeromancy

flavour: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold Special Card from either graveyard.
name: Aglais

flavour: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.
info: Play the strongest non-Gold unit from your deck. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: Alzur’s Double Cross

flavour: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.
info: Remove 7 strength from a non-Gold unit.
name: Alzur’s Thunder

flavour: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…
info: Immune to Fog. Gain 1 strength at the start of your turn if on a row affected by Fog.
name: Ancient Foglet

flavour: Ugly – nature's way of saying "stay away."
info: Play all Arachasae from your deck.
name: Arachas

flavour: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.
info: Spawn an Arachas whenever a unit on your side absorbs strength.
name: Arachas Behemoth

flavour: It's a griffin, just more... griffiny.
info: Remove Weather from its row and reset all weakened non-immune units there to their base strength.
name: Archgriffin

flavour: You humans have… unusual tastes.
info: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent draws 1 card.
name: Avallac’h

flavour: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.
info: Remove 2 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Ballista

flavour: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!
info: Add 1 strength to all your Dwarf units, wherever they are.
name: Barclay Els

info: Gain 2 strength for each weakened unit on the battlefield.
name: Bear

flavour: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.
info: Swap the strength of the strongest and the weakest units on the battlefield. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: Bekker’s Twisted Mirror

flavour: Now finish your soup, or a berserker'll come and swallow ye whole.
info: When moved to the graveyard, transform into a Bear.
name: Berserker

flavour: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.
info: Draw 3 cards. Keep 1 and discard the rest.
name: Birna Bran

flavour: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.
info: Spawn a Frost effect on both Melee rows that sets the strength of all non-Gold units on or appearing there to 1.
name: Biting Frost

flavour: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.
info: Spawn a Botchling or a Lubberkin.
name: Bloody Baron

flavour: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…
info: Return a Bronze, non-Relentless unit on your side (other than a Blue Mountain Commando) to your hand and immediately play it again.
name: Blue Mountain Commando

flavour: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.
info: Add 2 strength to all your other Blue Stripes Commandos, wherever they are.
name: Blue Stripes Commando

flavour: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.
info: Add 4 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Blue Stripes Scout

flavour: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.
info: Spawn a Spectral Whale on a random row on the opposite side.
name: Blueboy Lugos

flavour: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper - else they'll come back to haunt you.
info: Keep on the battlefield at the end of this round.
name: Botchling

flavour: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.
info: Remove an amount equal to this unit’s strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Braenn

flavour: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!
info: Play a Silver card from your deck.
name: Brouver Hoog

flavour: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.
info: Immune to Frost. Spawn a Frost effect and 2 Wild Hunt Hounds.
name: Caranthir

flavour: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosopher's have dreamt.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold unit (can be Permadeath) from your opponent’s graveyard.
name: Caretaker

flavour: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.
info: When moved to graveyard, convert to Silver.
name: Cerys

flavour: He'll not reveal his name till he's defeated. He's a troll errant, see?
info: Gain 2 strength at the start of your turn if it’s the sole unit on its row.
name: Champion of Champions

info: Remove 2 strength from all other units.
name: Chironex

flavour: A member of the Bovine Defense Force. Semper fi!
info: No ability.
name: Chort

flavour: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.
info: Ambush: When the round ends, return to the hand of the current owner if that player lost.
name: Ciaran

flavour: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.
info: Return to your hand if you lose the round.
name: Ciri

flavour: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.
info: When destroyed, move to your deck and gain 3 base strength.
name: Ciri: Dash

flavour: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!
info: Lose 2 strength.
name: Clan An Craite Warrior

flavour: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.
info: Immune to Rain. Remove 1 strength from 3 non-Gold unit(s).
name: Clan Brokvar Archer

flavour: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Undvik…
info: Remove 3 strength from a non-Gold unit.
name: Clan Brokvar Hunter

flavour: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!
info: Immune to Fog. Discard all Clan Dimun Pirates from your deck.
name: Clan Dimun Pirate

flavour: Haul together, hoist the colors high!
info: Immune to Fog. Gain 2 strength whenever you discard a unit.
name: Clan Dimun Pirate Captain

flavour: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.
info: Add 2 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
name: Clan Heymaey Skald

flavour: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.
info: Add 2 base strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith

flavour: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.
info: Gain 2 strength whenever another unit on your side is weakened.
name: Clan Tuirseach Axeman

flavour: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.
info: When resurrected, gain 4 base strength.
name: Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers

flavour: We are an Craite! What others buy with gold, we buy with our lifeblood.
info: Resurrect when discarded.
name: Clan an Craite Raider

info: Remove all Weather effects and reset all weakened non-immune units on affected rows to their base strength.
name: Clear Skies

flavour: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.
info: Double the strength of all non-Gold units on a row on your side, then banish.
name: Commander’s Horn

info: No ability.
name: Commando Neophyte

flavour: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Asgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.
info: Spawn Fog and Rain effects on the opposing side only.
name: Coral

flavour: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!
info: Spawn 2 Clan an Craite Warriors.
name: Crach An Craite

info: Add 2 strength to any non-Gold unit appearing on the row.
name: Craven Revived

flavour: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you will make.
info: Play all Crone units from your deck.
name: Crone: Brewess

flavour: I sense your pain. I see your fear.
info: Play all Crone units from your deck.
name: Crone: Weavess

flavour: I'd be your best – and last.
info: Play all Crone units from your deck.
name: Crone: Whispess

flavour: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.
info: Spawn a Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog Torrential Rain or First Light card.
name: Dagon

flavour: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.
info: Add 2 strength to each non-Gold unit played on your side and 1 strength to each played on the opposing side. Does not affect spawned units.
name: Dandelion

flavour: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.
info: Return a non-Gold, non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand, then banish.
name: Decoy

flavour: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?
info: Convert all other Gold units to Silver (or Bronze, if that was their original color). Gain 1 strength for each unit converted.
name: Dijkstra

flavour: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.
info: Reset all units on the battlefield to their base strength.
name: Dimeritium Bomb

info: Reset any unit on the battlefield to its base strength. If Gold, convert it to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color).
name: Dimeritium Shackles

flavour: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.
info: Remove 5 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Dol Blathanna Archer

flavour: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.
info: Ambush: When a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the row, remove 5 strength from all non-Gold units on the row (except self).
name: Dol Blathanna Trapper

flavour: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.
info: Draw 1 card and discard 1 random non-Gold card from your deck.
name: Donar an Hindar

flavour: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.
info: Add 2 base strength to all non-Gold units in your graveyard.
name: Draig Bon–Dhu

flavour: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.
info: Destroy all non-Gold units with 3 strength or lower on both sides of the battlefield.
name: Draug

flavour: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.
info: Immune to Rain. Move an opposing non-Gold unit to that side’s Siege row.
name: Drowner

flavour: A mimic, among the many other name for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings... or dopplers.
info: Set strength to that of an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Dudu

flavour: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?
info: After 2 turns, convert to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry

flavour: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver-skin caps might be elsewhere.
info: No ability.
name: Dun Banner Light Cavalry

flavour: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.
info: Gain 2 strength for each Dwarf unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Dwarven Mercenary

flavour: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.
info: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit. If it is not destroyed, gain 2 strength.
name: Dwarven Skirmisher

flavour: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.
info: When removed from the battlefield, spawn 3 Lesser Earth Elementals on the row where this unit was.
name: Earth Elemental

flavour: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.
info: Return a non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand and immediately play it again.
name: Eithné

flavour: Who would think that overgrown bats would have a taste for gaudy jewelry?
info: Destroy a non-Gold unit on your side and absorb its strength.
name: Ekimmara

flavour: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.
info: Gain 3 strength whenever a Commando Neophyte unit appears on your side.
name: Ele’yas

flavour: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.
info: Play a random non-Gold Special Card from your deck.
name: Elven Mercenary

flavour: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!
info: Gain 4 strength whenever an Ambush is played.
name: Elven Wardancer

flavour: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.
info: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
name: Epidemic

flavour: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
info: Play Eredin.
name: Eredin

flavour: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
info: Immune to Frost.
name: Eredin (Token)

flavour: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.
info: If possible, discard 2 cards and draw 2 cards.
name: Ermion

flavour: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…
info: Play Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
name: Eskel

info: Remove 2 strength from all other non-Gold units on the row.
name: Field Marshal Duda: Agitator

info: Add 2 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
name: Field Marshal Duda: Companion

flavour: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.
info: Resurrect a random non-Gold unit, non-Permadeath unit.
name: Field Medic

flavour: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.
info: No ability.
name: Fiend

flavour: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.
info: Spawn a Lesser Fire Elemental on this unit’s row at the start of your turn.
name: Fire Elemental

flavour: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.
info: Ambush: When a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the opposite side, remove 5 strength from it.
name: Fireball Trap

flavour: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…
info: Spawn either a Clear Skies or a Rally effect.
name: First Light

flavour: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.
info: Immune to Fog. Play from your deck or graveyard whenever Fog is spawned. Gain 1 strength whenever a Fog effect is applied. Destroy when moved outside of Fog or Fog is removed.
name: Foglet

flavour: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.
info: Choose a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield. Spawn an exact copy on the same row.
name: Foltest

flavour: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.
info: Redraw up to 3 cards.
name: Francesca

flavour: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
info: Every 2 turns, if possible, banish a random non-Gold Special Card in your graveyard and gain 3 strength.
name: Frightener

flavour: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.
info: Spawn 3 Shadows.
name: Gaunter O’Dimm

flavour: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.
info: No ability.
name: Geralt

flavour: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.
info: Move all non-Gold units on the opposite row one row back. Remove 1 strength from all moved units.
name: Geralt: Aard

flavour: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.
info: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the opposite row if that row totals 20 or more strength.
name: Geralt: Igni

flavour: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.
info: Set the strength of all non-Gold units on one of your rows to 6.
name: Ge’els

flavour: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.
info: Banish a random non-Gold unit in either graveyard from the game and absorb its strength.
name: Ghoul

flavour: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.
info: If possible, discard a non-Gold unit, absorb its strength and draw a card.
name: Giant Toad

flavour: Does not drink. Does not eat. Does walk, however. And fight.
info: When removed from the battlefield, spawn 2 Lesser Golem on the row where this unit was.
name: Golem

flavour: Their long tongues're for slurping marrow – and whipping prey.
info: After 1 turn, banish all non-Gold units in your graveyard and gain 1 strength for each.
name: Grave Hag

flavour: An archdruid, a master of alchemy, and the grumpiest old fart in the Isles.
info: Remove 2 strength from 3 non-Gold units on your sideof the battlefield. Gain 3 strength for each.
name: Gremist

flavour: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.
info: Move a non-Gold unit from your opponent’s graveyard to your own.
name: Griffin

flavour: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.
info: Remove 3 strength from all weakened opposing units and 2 strength from all other opposing units.
name: Harald the Cripple

flavour: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.
info: Add 3 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
name: Hawker Healer

flavour: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.
info: Gain 3 strength whenever you play a Special Card.
name: Hawker Support

info: Destroy all non-Gold units on both sides of the battlefield and remove all Weather effects.
name: Hemdall

flavour: King Henselt did not look like a thief, but, with all due respect, that's really what he was.
info: Convert all units on one of your rows to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Henselt

flavour: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!
info: Spawn a Lord of Undvik on the opposite side.
name: Hjalmar

flavour: Now let's drink to Emperor of Nilfgaard – may he die of somethin' hideous!
info: Immune to Fog. Remove 2 strength from 3 non-Gold units.
name: Holger Blackhand

flavour: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.
info: Immune to Frost. Gain 7 strength while on a row affected by Frost.
name: Ice Giant

flavour: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.
info: Ambush: When the next non-Gold Special Card is played, cancel its effects.
name: Ida Emean

flavour: Ladd nahw! Kill them! Litter the earth with their entrails!
info: Immune to Frost. Remove 3 strength from an opposing unit and 1 strength from all other units on its row.
name: Imlerith

flavour: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.
info: Spawn a Fog effect on both Ranged rows that sets the strength of all non-Gold units on or appearing there to 1.
name: Impenetrable Fog

flavour: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.
info: Remove 6 strength from an opposing unit.
name: Iorveth

info: When destroyed, add 3 strength to all opposing non-Gold units.
name: Iris

flavour: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.
info: Spawn 1 Commando Neophytes on random row whenever you play a Special Card.
name: Isengrim

flavour: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.
info: Add 3 strength to 3 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
name: John Natalis

flavour: Life without savoring the sound of "surreptitious shananacking" is like licking snails through a cloth.
info: Move a card in your hand to the bottom of your deck. Create in your hand a base copy of another card of the same color randomly chosen from both players’ cars (all locations). Banish when destroyed.
name: Johnny

flavour: Some call her the "Iron Maiden."
info: No ability.
name: Jutta an Dimun

flavour: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!
info: Convert a Gold unit to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color).
name: Kaedweni Sergeant

flavour: "You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees." "Do what by the what now?"
info: Add 3 strength to 2 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
name: Kaedweni Siege Support

flavour: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.
info: After 3 turns, spawn Hemdall on this unit’s side. Destroy Kambi whenever Hemdall appears on the same side.
name: Kambi

info: Every 3 turns, banish a random non-gold unit in your graveyard and absorb its strength.
name: Katakan

flavour: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword... then sell it, and hire a witcher.
info: Destroy 3 loyal non-Gold units and add their strength to this unit’s base strength. When removed, set base strength to 8.
name: Kayran

flavour: If I'm to die today, i wish to look smashing for the occasion.
info: Give a shield to all non-Gold units on the row. The shield protects its bearer from one strength-removing effect.
name: Keira Metz

flavour: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.
info: Discard 2 cards and add 2 base strength to them. Choose any card in your deck and place it in your hand.
name: King Bran

flavour: I might just discover I look great without ears... or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.
info: Play the weakest non-Gold unit from your deck. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: King of Beggars

flavour: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.
info: Remove 3 strength from all non-Gold units on a row.
name: Lacerate

flavour: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.
info: Play Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
name: Lambert

info: No ability.
name: Lesser Earth Elemental

info: No ability.
name: Lesser Fire Elemental

flavour: "Lesser does not mean worse!" - Master Istredd of Aedd Gynvael.
info: No ability.
name: Lesser Golem

flavour: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.
info: Immune to Rain.
name: Light Longship

info: Immune to Frost. When removed from the battlefield, add 10 strength to any Hjalmars on the opposite side.
name: Lord of Undvik

flavour: I name thee Dea and embrace thee as my daughter.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit.
name: Lubberkin

flavour: WAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!
info: After 2 turns, gain 1 strength for each unit in your graveyard.
name: Madman Lugos

flavour: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!
info: Keep on the battlefield at the end of each round.
name: Mahakam Defender

flavour: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.
info: Immune to Frost. Add 3 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield. If it’s a Dwarf, add 5 strength instead.
name: Mahakam Guard

flavour: I have you, dh'oine. You are all the same.
info: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-gold unit whenever a revealed Elf unit appears on your side.
name: Malena

flavour: We know little about what manticores look like: though many have seen them, very few have lived to tell their tale.
info: No ability.
name: Manticore

flavour: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.
info: Remove 4 strength from all instances of a non-Gold unit on its side.
name: Manticore Venom

flavour: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same...
info: Spawn either a Mutagen or a Spores effect.
name: Mardroeme

flavour: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.
info: Spawn a Ban Ard Adept whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Margarita Laux–Antille

flavour: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. "Oh my," gasped Yennefer. "We're about to make quite the mess, I think."
info: Spawn Frost and Rain.
name: Merigold’s Hailstorm

flavour: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.
info: Return the strongest non-Gold, non Relentless unit (except self) on each side to the owners’ hands. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: Milva

flavour: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!
info: Spawn a base copy of all Breedable units on your side of the battlefield.
name: Monster Nest

flavour: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.
info: If possible, destroy an unrevealed Ambush card and gain 4 strength.
name: Morenn

flavour: The vilest man Skellige's ever known.
info: When moved to the graveyard, lose 2 base strength and resurrect.
name: Morkvarg

info: Add 4 base strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Mutagen

flavour: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.
info: Choose a non-Gold unit three times. Remove 3 strength the first time, 2 the second and 1 the third.
name: Myrgtabrakke

flavour: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.
info: Spawn a base copy of the last non-Gold Special Card played, then banish.
name: Nature’s Gift

flavour: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.
info: While in your hand or deck, gain 1 strength whenever a unit on your side absorbs another’s strength. When removed from the battlefield, play a Nekker from your deck.
name: Nekker

flavour: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.
info: Create in your deck 2 base copies of a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Nekker Warrior

flavour: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit.
name: Nenneke

flavour: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.
info: Immune to Frost. Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a Wild Hunt unit appears on your side.
name: Nithral

flavour: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.
info: After 4 turns, remove 1 strength from all opposing non-Gold units and return this card to your hand.
name: Ocvist

flavour: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.
info: Move to a random row on the same side at the start of your turn and add 1 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
name: Odrin

flavour: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.
info: Resurrect at the start of the round and remove 2 base strength.
name: Olgierd

flavour: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.
info: Choose a non-Gold unit in your hand (other than the Operator). Create an exact copy in both players’ hands. Banish when destroyed.
name: Operator

flavour: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…
info: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) twice in a row.
name: Pavetta

flavour: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.
info: Set the strength of all other non-Gold units on the row to 1.
name: Philippa Eilhart

flavour: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?
info: Spawn an exact copy of this unit on the same row.
name: Poor Infantry

flavour: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.
info: Resurrect a Bronze non-Permadeath unit.
name: Priestess of Freya

flavour: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.
info: Draw 1 card face up and 1 card face down. Keep 1, return the other to your deck.
name: Prince Stennis

flavour: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.
info: Draw 2 non-Gold cards. Play 1 and return the other to your deck.
name: Priscilla

flavour: Mooooooo.
info: When removed from the battlfield, spawn a Chort on the row where this unit was.
name: Prize Winning Cow

flavour: Not wealth or fame but intentions true -- that's what makes a hero of you!
info: Convert all instances of a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Promote

flavour: The queen is guarded by the hardiest and fiercest shieldmaidens Skellige's ever known.
info: Resurrect all Queensguards and add 1 base strength to your Cerys unit, wherever it is.
name: Queensguard

flavour: The witcher raised a hand and quickly traced a path with it in the air. The crowd's rumble rose, the stones flew thicker. Yet the Sign curved their course, pushing them aside. They simply passed their target, protected by a shield unseen.
info: Give all instances of a non-gold unit on your side a shield. The shield protects its bearer from one strength-removing effect.
name: Quen Sign

info: No ability.
name: Rabid Wolf

flavour: A king should be merciless towards his enemies and generous to his friends.
info: Remove 8 strength from any unit.
name: Radovid

flavour: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.
info: Spawn Frost, Fog and Rain effects.
name: Ragh Nar Roog

info: Immune to Frost. When first appearing, gain 1 base strength of it’s Round 2 or 2 base strength if it’s Round 3.
name: Raging Bear

flavour: In their ballads skalds claim you cannot tell a berserker changed in the heat of battle from a true–born bear.
info: Transform into a Raging Bear if weakened but not destroyed.
name: Raging Berserker

info: Play a random Bronze unit from your deck.
name: Rally

flavour: See this here tattoo? 'At's me, hackin' at a dragon. A DRAGON, m'lady.
info: Add 1 strength to all your other Reaver Hunters, wherever they are. After 2 turns, play a Reaver Hunter from your deck.
name: Reaver Hunter

flavour: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.
info: Choose a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield. Play an instance of it from your deck.
name: Reaver Scout

flavour: I'll die for Redania, I'll kill for Redania… I'll even eat worms for Redania!
info: If 3 or more Redanian Elites are on your side of the battlefield, convert them to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Redanian Elite

flavour: For flory! For Radovid!
info: No ability.
name: Redanian Knight

flavour: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.
info: When removed from the battlefield, transform into Regis: Higher Vampire and play.
name: Regis

flavour: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.
info: No ability.
name: Regis: Higher Vampire

flavour: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.
info: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Reinforced Ballista

flavour: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.
info: Gain 2 strength whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Reinforced Siege Tower

flavour: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.
info: Every 3 turns, remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Reinforced Trebuchet

flavour: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforccements!
info: Play all instances from your deck of a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Reinforcement

flavour: Medicus curat, magicae sanat.
info: Resurrect a Gold unit.
name: Renew

flavour: Those cursed sorcresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?
info: Add 2 to the base strength of a non-Gold unit in your graveyard (can be Permadeath), then resurrect it.
name: Restoration

flavour: Geralt, we gotta have a man-to-horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.
info: Play on a random row from your deck or graveyard whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Roach

flavour: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.
info: When destroyed, remove 3 strength from all non-Gold units on its side.
name: Sabrina Glevissig

flavour: Little Sarah wants to play!
info: Immune to Weather. Gain 3 strength each time a Weather effect appears.
name: Sarah

flavour: I care not for kings and their titles. In the east lives one who truly deserves a crown.
info: Remove 1 strength from all opposing non-Gold units. Add 1 strength to all non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
name: Saskia

flavour: "Tame"? Och, lad, Skelligers might train bears, but that don't at all mean they tame 'em…
info: Remove 1 strength from each non-Gold unit played on the battlefield. Does not affect spawned units.
name: Savage Bear

flavour: Time to look death in the face.
info: Ambush: When the next non-Gold Special Card is played, cancel its effects, then destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
name: Schirru

flavour: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.
info: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
name: Scorch

info: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Shadow

flavour: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit and convert it to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Shani

flavour: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!
info: No ability.
name: Sheldon Skaggs

flavour: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold unit (can be Permadeath). Gain 1 strength whenever a unit is played from the graveyard.
name: Sigrdrifa

flavour: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.
info: Remove 4 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Sile de Tansarville

flavour: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.
info: Spawn Fog and Rain effects.
name: Skellige Storm

flavour: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!
info: Remove 3 strength from this unit, then from the strongest opposing non-Gold unit(s). When removed from the battlefield, spawn Craven Revived on the same row.
name: Skjall

info: Immune to Weather. Move to a random opposing row at the start of your turn and remove 1 strength from all non-Gold units on the row.
name: Spectral Whale

info: Remove 4 base strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Spores

flavour: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.
info: Remove 2 strength from all non-Gold units on both sides of the battlefield.
name: Stammelford’s Tremors

flavour: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.
info: If possible, discard 1 card and draw 1 card.
name: Svanrige

flavour: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.
info: Add 8 strength to a non-Gold unit. If it’s a Witcher, add 12 strength instead.
name: Swallow Potion

flavour: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…
info: Redraw up to 1 card.
name: Thaler

flavour: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.
info: Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.
name: The Last Wish

flavour: The witcher's face changed… His mien turning inhuman, horrifying.
info: Add 4 strength to all instances of a non-Gold unit on its side. If it’s a Witcher, add 6 strength instead.
name: Thunderbolt Potion

flavour: Even the rain in this land smells vile.
info: Spawn a Rain effect on both Siege rows that sets the strength of all non-Gold units on or appearing there to 1.
name: Torrential Rain

flavour: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.
info: Ambush: When the player on the opposing side passes, add 2 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
name: Toruviel

flavour: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!
info: Remove 2 strength from 2 opposing non-Gold units.
name: Trebuchet

flavour: I can take care of myself. Trust me.
info: Remove 4 strength from an opposing unit.
name: Triss Merigold

flavour: Join me King Ravodid army. Order got - guard boatses.
info: Remove 1 strength from all non-Gold units on the opposite row. Gain 1 strength for each.
name: Trololo

flavour: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.
info: Move a random card from your opponent’s graveyard to your hand.
name: Udalryk

info: Add 2 strength to all other units.
name: Unicorn

flavour: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.
info: Remove 5 strength from any opposing unit.
name: Vernon Roche

flavour: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.
info: Play a Blue Stripes Commando from your deck whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Ves

flavour: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.
info: Play Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
name: Vesemir

flavour: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.
info: After 3 turns, destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) twice in a row.
name: Villentretenmerth

flavour: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.
info: No ability.
name: Vran Warrior

flavour: "Vrihedd? What's that mean?" "Trouble."
info: No ability.
name: Vrihedd Brigade

flavour: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.
info: Add 3 strength to a non-Gold unit in your hand.
name: Vrihedd Dragoon

flavour: ”Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.
info: Add 1 strength to the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on your side of the battlefield (except self), remove 1 strength from the weakest opposing non-Gold unit(s).
name: Vrihedd Officer

flavour: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.
info: Remove 2 strength from all non-Gold units on the row whenever a Special Card is played.
name: Vrihedd Sappers

flavour: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.
info: Spawn a Commando Neophyte on a random row.
name: Vrihedd Vanguard

flavour: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.
info: Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a unit on your side is destroyed or you discard a unit.
name: War Longship

flavour: Some fight for Temeria. Other fight for Nilfgaard. I fight for the Heron.
info: Double the strength of all weakened non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
name: Warcry

flavour: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!
info: Immune to Rain. Spawn a Rain effect.
name: Water Hag

flavour: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.
info: Spawn Frost and Fog effects.
name: White Frost

flavour: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.
info: Immune to Frost.
name: Wild Hunt Hound

flavour: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.
info: Immune to Frost. Play all Wild Hunt Riders from your deck.
name: Wild Hunt Rider

flavour: The White Frost is coming.
info: Immune to Frost. Remove 1 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit and gain 2 strength if that unit is destroyed.
name: Wild Hunt Warrior

flavour: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.
info: Immune to Fog. Spawn a Fog effect and 3 Rabid Wolves.
name: Woodland Spirit

flavour: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.
info: Remove 4 strength from an opposing unit non-Gold unit.
name: Wyvern

flavour: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.
info: Remove 2 strength from all other non-Gold units on the row. Draw a card.
name: Yaevinn

flavour: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.
info: Keep on the battlefield at the end of this round.
name: Yarpen Zigrin

flavour: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
info: Spawn either a Unicorn or a Chironex.
name: Yennefer

flavour: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice... and when to conjure fire.
info: At the start of your turn, remove 1 strength from the strongest non-Gold unit(s) (except self) on the battlefield.
name: Yennefer: The Conjurer

flavour: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.
info: Keep on the battlefield at the end of each round.
name: Zoltan Chivay

flavour: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
info: Spawn one of the two Field Marshal Duda units.
name: Zoltan: Animal Tamer
